mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TB_PTFOLIO_STUDY_COMT WHERE SCOMT_STUDY_SEQ = #{studySeq}

SELECT SCOMT_SEQ as "seq", SCOMT_STUDY_SEQ as "studySeq", SCOMT_NAME as "name", SCOMT_PWD as "password", SCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", SCOMT_DATE as "date", SCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_STUDY_COMT WHERE SCOMT_STUDY_SEQ = #{studySeq} ORDER BY CONCAT(IF(SCOMT_PARENT_SEQ is null, COALESCE(SCOMT_PARENT_SEQ, ''), CONCAT('_', LPAD(SCOMT_PARENT_SEQ,6,'0')) ), '_',LPAD(SCOMT_SEQ,6,'0')) LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPgLine}

SELECT SCOMT_SEQ as "seq", SCOMT_STUDY_SEQ as "studySeq", SCOMT_NAME as "name", SCOMT_PWD as "password", SCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", SCOMT_DATE as "DATE", SCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_STUDY_COMT WHERE SCOMT_SEQ = #{seq}
